component.text:
Constraint Gathered Data Comments
Budget Estimated at $500,000 over next two years. Expect $200,000 to be available through the end of year, and $300,000 in the following year. Need to prioritize what to implement first.
Policy Prefers single vendor and standardized protocols. Current equipment is all Cisco; prefers to stay with it.
Schedule Plans to introduce new applications in the next nine months. New applications include limited video conferencing and IP telephony.
Personnel Two engineers have Cisco CCNA® certificates, and one is working towards Cisco CCNP® certificate. Plans to hire one engineer in the network department; still need technical development plan.
